articles.author: Nidhi Verma, Chen Aizhu, Siyi Liu, Florence Tan
articles.title: Tougher U.S. sanctions to curb Russian oil supply to China and India - Reuters
articles.description: Chinese and Indian refiners will source more oil from the Middle East, Africa and the Americas, boosting prices and freight costs.

articles.title: Kumbh Mela: India races to prepare huge Prayagraj gathering - BBC.com
articles.description: The Hindu festival of Kumbh Mela, described as humanity's biggest gathering, begins in India's Prayagraj.
articles.content:
Thousands of Hindu holy men have been arriving in Prayagraj to participate in the Kumbh Mela festival
Authorities in India are racing against time to get the city of Prayagraj ready to host the Hind… [+7319 chars]
